ul.li: The original GWT GUI has been replaced with a Topcat plugin
Job Types are now reloaded dynamically
Allow Job Types to specify that multiple inputs should always be passed to a single job
Link job provenance to job that created it, and display provenance details in the GUI
Check that each job type has a corresponding ICAT Application in each Facility, creating it if necessary
Keep the ICAT session alive so long as there are queued or executing jobs

section.p: Initial release - this is the first properly tagged release
